CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Homopolymer P6 was synthesized by palladium - catalyzed homocoupling of the dibromide 5b in the presence of hexabutylditin.

Let's think step by step.

1. Homopolymer P6
2. Dibromide 5b
3. Hexabutylditin
4. Palladium (implied as the catalyst, but not explicitly mentioned as a material name in the paragraph)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Homopolymer P6 |
| Dibromide 5b |
| Hexabutylditin |

2. Dibromide 5b
3. Hexabutylditin

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph do not refer to material properties, but rather to reagents and catalysts used in the synthesis process.
